description:
Out of sight, out of mind — ⁣
⁣
Most my life, I had lived the way I was taught and what society infused in my brain. ⁣
⁣
To trust and believe everyone in higher power. To trust professionals always because they have a degree & know what’s best for you. How do they know what’s best for everyone? One size does NOT fit all. ⁣
⁣
The past 7 months, my eyes have been opened to so many things. And it was all because the day I found out I was pregnant, my motherly intuition prompted me to do my research on so many topics. Topics I’d never even questioned or second guessed before.⁣
⁣
Out of sight, out of mind. ⁣
⁣
I didn’t know. I wasn’t informed. And now that I am, I cannot unknow what I know. ⁣
⁣
And now with any choice, decision, view... I will now KNOW why I am making the choice or not making a choice. I refuse to go with the crowd because everyone tells you to do so — even those with degrees. ⁣
⁣
Thankful for Gods guidance through this all because going against the grain isn’t easy. Especially when you’re a new mama. ⁣
⁣
So to those who are searching, keep searching. Know your WHY. Know all your options. Seek the Truth. Do what you feel is best for your family for YOU, not to please anyone else. And trust the Lords leading and direction — no matter where He leads you to because He gave you those God given motherly instincts for a reason... and no degree can trump that. 🌿
